name: XBT Provider Etherum EUR
summary: The CoinShares XBT Provider Ethereum Tracker Euro ETP (Ticker: COINETHE, ISIN: SE0010296582) is an exchange-traded product offering investors exposure to Ethereum's price movements without the complexities of direct cryptocurrency ownership. Launched in 2017 and denominated in euros, this ETP is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm, providing a regulated avenue for Ethereum investment.

name: XBT XRP Tracker SEK
summary: The CoinShares XBT Provider XRP ETP (Ticker: COINXRP, ISIN: SE0011414481) is an exchange-traded product offering investors exposure to XRP's price movements without the complexities of direct cryptocurrency ownership. Launched in 2019 and denominated in Swedish kronor (SEK), this ETP is listed on the Nordic Growth Market Exchange, providing a regulated avenue for XRP investment.

name: XBT XRP Tracker EUR
summary: The CoinShares XBT Provider XRP Tracker Euro ETP (Ticker: COINXRPE, ISIN: SE0011414473) is an exchange-traded product that offers investors exposure to XRP's price movements without the complexities of direct cryptocurrency ownership. Launched in 2019 and denominated in euros, this ETP is listed on the Nordic Growth Market Exchange, providing a regulated avenue for XRP investment.

name: Sarasin IE GlobalSar - Dynamic (GBP) Class A Accumulating Shares
summary: Sarasin IE GlobalSar - Dynamic (GBP) Class A Accumulating Shares is a sub-fund of Sarasin Investment Funds ICVC, aiming for capital appreciation through global investment, primarily in equities. The fund is denominated in GBP and reinvests income. Sarasin Asset Management manages the fund, based in London.

name: Man Stockmarket Managed Fund Retail Accumulation Shares (Class A)
summary: Man Stockmarket Managed Fund Retail Accumulation Shares (Class A) is a fund managed by Man Group, focusing on stock market investments with the aim of achieving capital growth. It is a retail fund and the 'Accumulation Shares' designation indicates that any income generated is reinvested within the fund. Man Group is a global investment management firm headquartered in London.
